targets.rawSql: SELECT error AS "MAPE" FROM past_prediction_row WHERE error IS NOT NULL ORDER BY createdat DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT error AS "MAPE", createdat "Time" FROM past_prediction_row WHERE $__timeFilter(createdat) ORDER BY createdat

panels.description: Shows the realtime data (green) and the prediction with the area between the upper and lower bound

targets.rawSql: SELECT avg_usage_cpu * total_cpu / 100 AS "Node Index", "time" as time FROM metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
SELECT "time" AS time, value AS "Prediction", lower, upper FROM past_prediction WHERE createdat = (SELECT createdat FROM past_prediction ORDER BY createdat DESC LIMIT 1)

panels.title: Prediction

panels.description: Past prediction made by the prophet prediction model

targets.rawSql: SELECT "time", value AS "Node Index", createdat FROM past_prediction WHERE $__timeFilter(createdat)
SELECT avg_usage_cpu * total_cpu / 100 AS "Node Index", "time" as time FROM metrics
